title: AppData
description: The top-level data for the app

items.description: An array of data items that the app is publishing

path.description: The path at which this app is installed

schedule.description: Request that the platform run the app at the specified schedule, if it does not have its own methods of scheduling updates

ui.description: Information only used to render the UI of the app

AppItem.description: An item published by the app

id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies this item among others published by the app

persistent.description: Whether the item can be dismissed by the viewer

state_key.description:
An ID that can be compared to a previous copy of the item to see if it should be considered changed. On an item change, the data will be updated regardless, but the "dismissed" state will be reset only if state_key has changed, so this can be used to skip resurfacing an item when only small changes have been made.

If state_key is not used, the platform will compare individual fields of the item.

updated.description: When the item was last updated

data.description: Extra structured data for use by chart or other formatters

detail.description: Extra information which can be shown

icon.description: An icon to show with this item

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display below the title

title.description: The title at the top of the card

url.description: A URL to open when the title is clicked

AppSchedule.description: A schedule on which to run this app. This is not implemented yet.

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the app

cron.description: The cron schedule for the app

AppUiInfo.description: Information only used to render the UI of the app

icon.description: The icon that the app should show (exact format TBD)

id.description: A unique ID among other notifications for this app

icon.description: An icon to show with the notification

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display below the title

title.description: The title at the top of the card
